creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: red with white trim; sleeveless; 23 appliqued human figures and one drawn human figure on front of coat; ink-drawn figures at interior chest; open sides; one green monster-like figure appliques on back of each shoulder
object_name: Shaman's Coat, from a two-piece set
title: Shaman's Coat, from a two-piece set
